welcome.title: Fast, free and full of new features
welcome.description: The latest version of GNOME makes computing easier than ever.

software.title: All the applications you need
software.description: Install and manage software from Flathub, Snap Store and Ubuntu archive.

accessibility.title: Accessible for everyone
accessibility.description: GNOME is all about the belief that computing is meant for everyone.

help.title: Help and Support
help.description: The official Ubuntu documentation is available both online and via the Help icon in the dock.
